block.p: BASEBALL
American League
BOSTON RED SOX--Activated 2B Jose Offerman from the 15-day disabled list. Optioned RHP Dan Smith to Pawtucket of the International League.
TEXAS RANGERS--Designated OF Jason McDonald for assignment.
TORONTO MAPLE LEAFS--Signed RHP Dustin McGowan, RHP Michael Smith and SS William Rivera.
National League
MONTREAL EXPOS--Placed RHP T.J Tucker on the 15-day disabled list. Recalled LHP David Moraga from Ottawa of the International League. Transferred LHP Matt Blank from the 15- to 60-day DL.
BASKETBALL
National Basketball Association
NBA--Reclassified a flagrant foul committed by L.A. Lakers C Shaquille O'Neal in Game 2 of the NBA Finals as a personal foul.
HOCKEY
National Hockey League
CALGARY FLAMES--Acquired a 2000 second-round draft pick from Anaheim for G Jean-Sebastien Giguere.
VANCOUVER CANUCKS--Agreed to terms with D Greg Hawgood and C Darby Hendrickson.
